sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row>
      <v-col >
        <v-card class="pa-4">
          <v-row>
            <v-col :cols="8">
              <v-row class="text-center">
                <v-col>
                  <v-btn x-large color="teal" dark @click="getReport">
                    GO!
                  </v-btn>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
              <v-row>
                <v-col>
                  <v-card class="pa-4">
                    THIS DOC BROUGHT TO YOU BY SO AND SO
                  </v-card>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
              <v-row>
                <v-col>
                  <v-select
                    :value="scenario.theme"
                    @change="changeTheme($event)"
                    :items="themes"
                    item-text="name"
                    item-value="id"
                    outlined hide-details dense>
                    <template v-slot:append-outer>
                      <v-icon
                        v-if="themeChanged"
                        color="green" icon
                        @click="saveTheme()">mdi-check-circle</v-icon>
                    <!-- </template>
                    <template v-slot:append-outer > -->
                      <v-icon
                        v-if="!themeChanged"
                        color="green" icon
                        @click="toggleThemeSettings()">mdi-wrench-outline</v-icon>
                    </template>
                  </v-select>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-col>
            <!-- <v-divider vertical /> -->
            <template lang="html">
                  <v-col :cols="4">
                    <v-card class="my-2 pa-3" v-if="loading">
                      <v-card-text class="pa-0">
                        {{ loadingText }}
                      </v-card-text>
                    </v-card>
                    <v-card
                      class="my-2 pa-3"
                      v-for="report in reports"
                      :key="report.id"
                      :href="report.file">
                      <v-card-text class="pa-0">
                        Report created on {{report.created_at}}
                      </v-card-text>
                    </v-card>
                  </v-col>
            </template>
          </v-row>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row v-show="scenario && showThemeSettings && !themeChanged">
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
            <ThemeTable
              :user="user"
              :scenario="scenario"
              @load-themes="loadThemes($event)"/>
        </v-card >
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import ThemeTable from "@/components/ThemeTable.vue";

export default {
  name: "Output",
  props: {
    scenario: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    },
    user: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      reports: null,
      themes: [],
      showThemeSettings: false,
      newTheme: null,
      loading: false,
      timer: null,
      loadingText: 'Creating Report',
      text: [
        "Reticulating Splines",
        "Adjusting Bell Curves",
        "Aligning Covariance Matrices",
        "Asserting Packed Exemplars",
        "Growing Data Trees",
        "Attemping to Lock Back-Buffer",
        "Compounding Inert Tessellations",
        "Computing Optimal Bin Packing",
        "Containing Existential Buffer",
        "Decomposing Singularities",
        "Extracting Resources",
        "Integrating Curves",
        "Iterating Cellular Automata",
        "Lecturing Errant Subsystems",
        "Obfuscating Quigley Matrix",
        "Realigning Alternate Timeframes",
        "Reverse Engineering Image Consultant",
        "Sequencing Particles",
        "Time-Compressing Simulator Clock",
      ]
    };
  },
  components: {
    ThemeTable,
  },
  computed: {
    themeChanged() {
      if (this.newTheme === null) {
        return false
      } else {
        return !(this.newTheme === this.scenario.theme)
      }
    },
  },
  methods: {
    generateText() {
      let _self = this;
      this.timer = setInterval(function() {
        let max = _self.text.length;
        let i = Math.floor(Math.random() * Math.floor(max));
        _self.loadingText =  _self.text[i];
      }, 1500);
    },
    changeTheme(event) {
      this.newTheme = event;
    },
    toggleThemeSettings(){
      this.showThemeSettings = !this.showThemeSettings;
    },
    loadThemes(event){
      this.themes = event;
    },
    saveTheme(){
      if (this.showThemeSettings) {
        this.toggleThemeSettings();
      }
      if (this.newTheme != this.scenario.theme) {
        this.scenario.theme = this.newTheme;
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenario.id}/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", this.scenario).then(
          this.newTheme = null
        )
      }
    },
    getAllReports() {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenario.id}/reports/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.reports = data.results;
      });
    },
    getReport() {
      this.loading = true;
      this.generateText();
      this.scenario.generate_document = true;
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenario.id}/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", this.scenario).then(data => {
        this.reports.push(data)
        clearInterval(this.timer);
        this.loading = false;
      })
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getAllReports()
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="css" scoped>
</style>
